name: Snowball Game
description:
The concept is simple - Throw snowballs at the antagonistic bully 3 times to win. Good luck.

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Move

Spacebar - Charge snowball throw

Music Credits:

"Jingle Bells (Calm)" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
"Wish Background" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
"Christmas Rap" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
Music from https://filmmusic.io

Christmas Overture from "Ultimate Game Music Collection"
https://johnleonardfrench.com/ultimate-game-music-collection/
